biotools.summary: fullsibQTL is an R package for QTL mapping in biparental populations of outcrossing species. fullsibQTL performs QTL mapping in outbred (outcrossing) species, considering a full-sib cross (or F1 population) as a mapping population.

bioschemas.name: fullsibQTL
bioschemas.summary: fullsibQTL is an R package for QTL mapping in biparental populations of outcrossing species. fullsibQTL performs QTL mapping in outbred (outcrossing) species, considering a full-sib cross (or F1 population) as a mapping population.
